snippet: White children are more likely than black or Hispanic children to be given CT scans when arriving at emergency rooms with minor head trauma, a study has found.
abstract: White children are more likely than black or Hispanic children to be given CT scans when arriving at emergency rooms with minor head trauma, a study has found.

headline.main: CT Scans More Likely for White Children
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs | Disparities: CT Scans More Likely for White Children
